title: Black Friday blowout deals drive M3 MacBook Pro prices down to $1,199+
description: Save up to $600 instantly during the 2024 Black Friday price war as retailers, including Best Buy, clear out remaining M3 MacBook Pro inventory for the holidays.Save up to $600 during Best Buy's Black Friday sale.Best Buy's official Black Friday deals are shaving hundreds of dollars off blowout M3 MacBook Pro models to make room for the new M4 lineup — and shoppers can benefit from price drops to the tune of up to $600 off the last-gen configs. Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Save up to $600 instantly during the 2024 Black Friday price war as retailers, including Best Buy, clear out remaining M3 MacBook Pro inventory for the holidays.

Prices start at just $1,199 across the line, with a roundup of top picks from the sale below: Blowout 14-inch MacBook Pro discounts M3, 8GB, 512GB: $1,199 ($400 off) M3, 8GB, 1TB: $1,399 ($400 off) M3 Pro, 11C CPU, 14C GPU, 18GB, 512GB: $1,699 ($300 off) M3 Pro, 12C CPU, 18C GPU, 18GB, 1TB: $2,099 ($400 off) M3 Max, 14C CPU, 30C GPU, 36GB, 1TB: $2,799 ($400 off) [Or get new M4 model for $100 more] Closeout 16-inch MacBook Pro savings M3 Pro, 12C CPU, 18C GPU, 18GB, 512GB: $1,999 ($500 off) M3 Pro, 12C CPU, 18C GPU, 36GB, 512GB: $2,399 ($500 off) M3 Max, 14C CPU, 30C GPU, 36GB, 1TB: $2,899 ($600 off) M3 Max, 16C CPU, 40C GPU, 48GB, 1TB, Space Black: $3,399 ($600 off)
html:
Save up to $600 during Best Buy's Black Friday sale.

Save up to $600 instantly during the 2024 Black Friday price war as retailers, including Best Buy, clear out remaining M3 MacBook Pro inventory for the holidays.

Save up to $600 on Apple's M3 MacBook Pro

Best Buy's official Black Friday deals are shaving hundreds of dollars off blowout M3 MacBook Pro models to make room for the new M4 lineup — and shoppers can benefit from price drops to the tune of up to $600 off the last-gen configs.

Prices start at just $1,199 across the line, with a roundup of top picks from the sale below:

Blowout 14-inch MacBook Pro discounts

  • M3, 8GB, 512GB: $1,199 ($400 off)
  • M3, 8GB, 1TB: $1,399 ($400 off)
  • M3 Pro, 11C CPU, 14C GPU, 18GB, 512GB: $1,699 ($300 off)
  • M3 Pro, 12C CPU, 18C GPU, 18GB, 1TB: $2,099 ($400 off)
  • M3 Max, 14C CPU, 30C GPU, 36GB, 1TB: $2,799 ($400 off) [Or get new M4 model for $100 more]

Closeout 16-inch MacBook Pro savings

  • M3 Pro, 12C CPU, 18C GPU, 18GB, 512GB: $1,999 ($500 off)
  • M3 Pro, 12C CPU, 18C GPU, 36GB, 512GB: $2,399 ($500 off)
  • M3 Max, 14C CPU, 30C GPU, 36GB, 1TB: $2,899 ($600 off)
  • M3 Max, 16C CPU, 40C GPU, 48GB, 1TB, Space Black: $3,399 ($600 off)
